short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Blender's issue pages, this extension adds a button that lists the issues most similar to the one reported on the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Blender's issue pages, this extension adds a button that lists the issues most similar to the one reported on the page.
